___ipv___comment_wav_pre_emphasis_coef: pre-emphasis coefficient for high frequency sparing
___ipv___comment_nfft: how many frequencies to test for fft (####################################### MUST CHANGE THIS TO 1024)
___tt2___comment_fft_window_size: how many samples to look for a single windowing function application
___tt2___comment_fft_hop_size: how many samples to shift for next windowing function application
___tt2___comment_fft_window_fn: windowing function to filter wav, reducing spectral leakage
___tt2___comment_fft_is_center: true for left right padding, false for no padding
___tt2___comment_mel_bins: how many mel coefs to extract
___tt2___comment_mel_fmin: mel filter banks minimum frequency #######TO BE FIXED LATER 125#######
___ipv___comment_is_legacy: if legacy mode is selected, normalization kicks in rather than log clipping
___ipv___comment_min_normalized_db: range min for normalization                           -(4 or 1)               -(4 or 1)
___ipv___comment_max_normalized_db: range max for normalization                           (4 or 1)                (4 or 1)
